text: Plectorhinchus ceylonensis, the Sri Lanka sweetlips, is a species of grunt native to the Indian Ocean around Sri Lanka. It inhabits waters over coral reefs at depths from . This species can reach TL. This species can be found in the aquarium trade. ==References== *Animaldiversity Web Category:Haemulidae Category:Fish described in 1956
title: Plectorhinchus ceylonensis
